alert.note: Alert for Lipscomb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 7:40PM CDT until July 07 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lipscomb County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 740 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles northwest of Lipscomb, moving east at 40 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR PORTIONS OF LIPSCOMB COUNTY. HAZARD...90 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Automated weather equipment. IMPACT...You are in a life-threatening situation. Flying debris may be deadly to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be heavily damaged or destroyed. Homes and businesses will have substantial roof and window damage. Expect extensive tree damage and power outages. * Locations impacted include... Lipscomb, Follett, Higgins and Darrouzett. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...90 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
